name: Babylon DAO
description:
BabylonDAO is a decentralized autonomous organization that aims to build the reserve currency on the Solana network. All $BBY (Babylon native token) is backed by a basket of assets that produces an intrinsic value that it cannot fall below.

You can Stake, Bond and Sell!

More info: https://docs.babylondao.finance/

Share and spread the word! And !Pray to Marduk!

Credits:

Made with RPG Maker MZ

Plugins by Visustella, MOG Hunter, SRD, PKD and Raizen.

Music 'Quirky-Runner_Looping' by Eric Matias (https://soundimage.org/)

Images and Memes Pixabay and Google.
